column1: Great product and smells amazing... like chocolate!!! Small amount goes along way.
It's good for my face, plus it feels good and smells good. What's not to like?
Been using for about a week now, has made my skin very soft . Using twice a day morning and night.
Great nighttime moisturizer; leaves a little bit of a film though
Just a little dent on the jar. Its sealed so its good.
